external_references.description: Parisi, T. (2022, December 2). Not a SIMulation: CrowdStrike Investigations Reveal Intrusion Campaign Targeting Telco and BPO Companies. Retrieved June 30, 2023.

description: During [C0027](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0027), [Scattered Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1015) leveraged compromised credentials from victim users  to authenticate to Azure tenants.(Citation: Crowdstrike TELCO BPO Campaign December 2022)
